author: Warhammer
description:
Pledge your allegiance to the Imperial faith and storm into combat as Sister of Battle Nyra Veyrath in Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun 2! 

You’ll be able to choose between two playable characters in the sequel for Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun, each offering their own unique abilities, weapons, and play style! 

Find out more and wishlist the game on Steam: https://ow.ly/ALb050XgPU8

Warhammer 40,000 Boltgun 2 is coming to PC, PS5 & Xbox Series X|S in 2026.

Find out more and see all today's Warhammer Day 2025 news at Warhammer Community: https://www.warhammer-community.com/en-gb/articles/drhxkfhd/celebrate-warhammer-day-2025-with-new-action-figures-statues-video-game-reveals-and-promotions-and-more/

author: Warhammer
description:
The exciting new Deffkopta blazes through the skies in the latest free update to Warhammer 40,000: Speed Freeks on Steam. As the first flying vehicle to be added to the game, the Deffkopta is speedy, agile and packs a punch with its rokkits, bombs and slicing melee ability.

Find out more and see all today's Warhammer Day 2025 news at Warhammer Community: https://www.warhammer-community.com/en-gb/articles/drhxkfhd/celebrate-warhammer-day-2025-with-new-action-figures-statues-video-game-reveals-and-promotions-and-more/

Head over to the game's Steam page to get a closer look - but not too close, or you might get sliced n diced!
https://ow.ly/Ae3350XgPLW

author: Warhammer
description:
Watch the Alpha Release Date Trailer for Warhammer 40,000: Dark Heresy — party-based, story-driven cRPG from Owlcat Games.

As an acolyte of the Inquisition, lead investigations, uncover vast conspiracies, master tactical combat, and make decisive choices in service of the God-Emperor. 

The Alpha launches on December 16 on PC (Steam). Become a founder: https://darkheresy.owlcat.games/ 

Join the Inquisition and wishlist Warhammer 40,000: Dark Heresy on Steam:
https://ow.ly/4H3R50XgMfb

author: Warhammer
description:
Every detail tells the story of Sigmar’s chosen assassin: the splintered war platform beneath her feet, the Orruk helm crushed into the dirt, the storm-forged fury carved into every line of her form.

This dynamic pose was brought to life by our passionate artists, drawing on decades of experience in worldbuilding and character design, distilling Neave’s relentless spirit into collectible form. From the delicate arc of her braided hair in motion, to the painstaking textures of battered iron and bloodied blades, each element has been sculpted, refined, and painted with the same obsessive attention to detail that has come to define our craft.

A hero of the Mortal Realms rendered in full 1:6 scale, Neave Blacktalon, The God-King’s Assassin is a divine example of crafting myth into matter, and fury into form. 

Pre-order now: https://wetanz.com/neave-blacktalon

Find out more and see all today's Warhammer Day 2025 news at Warhammer Community: https://www.warhammer-community.com/en-gb/art
title: Wētā Workshop Neave Blacktalon, The God-King's Assassin, 1:6 Scale Statue | Warhammer Age of Sigmar

author: Warhammer
description:
